Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n3dkgbtJPe1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3b4eb434adc8ccddc2b81d47cbfd507b/tumblr_inline_n3dkhtglZl1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><strong>arc5555</strong> created a stunning <strong>Kerbal</strong> papercraft. If you want to learn how it was done, click <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69295-Creating-a-kerbal-papercraft-model"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

That is incredible. The talent that this game and forum draw to it like Eves gravity well, never ceases to amaze me.

Never have I had the pleasure of being part of such a creative and intelligent community. Nor one so pleasent.

Now get off of my asteroid! But, could you leave me a pizza before you go?

Edited April 5, 2014 by pslytely psycho

Yeah I did pepakura for a short period of time. This stuff is insane. Very rewarding, but very tough to do well and even more insane to design! Good on you!

Later.
